constitutionalAuthorityStatementText:
[Congressional Record Volume 167, Number 36 (Thursday, February 25, 2021)]
[House]
From the Congressional Record Online through the Government Publishing Office [www.gpo.gov]
By Mr. BILIRAKIS:
H.R. 1324.
Congress has the power to enact this legislation pursuant
to the following:
This bill is enacted pursuant to Article 1, Section 8,
Clause 18 of the Constitution of the United States.
[Page H730]

latestAction.text: Received in the Senate and Read twice and referred to the Committee on Health, Education, Labor, and Pensions.

title: Effective Suicide Screening and Assessment in the Emergency Department Act of 2021
